players.name: Alice
memory: You: "I have noticed that Diana was found dead last night, and it is important that we remain vigilant and work together to identify the culprit. Let us focus on discussing potential suspects and gathering information to make an informed decision."
You: "I believe we should all share any information we may have that could help us identify the culprit. Let's work together to ensure a fair and just outcome for everyone."
Charlie: "Let's all share our observations and any clues we have. We need to be thorough in our investigation to catch the mafioso."
Bob: "I've investigated Alice and found her to be the mafioso. I suggest we focus our efforts on questioning her."
